attributes.action: make st georges day a public holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the english people should have a public holiday to celebrate their patron saint and celebrate their englishness

rejection.details:
Identical to an existing petition

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ST-GEORGES/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
